about_the_game:
Unlock the following skins by purchasing the Bright Memory: Black Kitten DLC

*Turning on Perspective-assist will allow you to view custom skins during certain scenes.


  • Black Kitten: Shelia (Character costume)
  • Assault Rifle: Titanium Silver (Weapon skin)
  • Shotgun: Titanium Silver (Weapon skin)
  • Handgun: Titanium Silver (Weapon skin)
  • Sniper Rifle: Titanium Silver (Weapon skin)
  • Steel Club: Titanium Silver (Weapon skin)
  • Smartphone wallpaper (Saved in game installation folder)
